verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6458>me<s%>, Hew you <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto me into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

And I will <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> which you <S%H7665>brakest<s%>, and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And I <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6458>hewed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, having the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%>, according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4385>writing<s%>, the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto you in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> gave them unto <S%H5414>me<s%>.

And I <S%H6437>turned<s%> myself and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> which I had <S%H6213>made<s%>; and there they <S%H3068>be<s%>, as the Lord commanded <S%H6680>me<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from Beeroth of the sons of <S%H885>Jaakan<s%> to <S%H4149>Mosera<s%>: there <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and there he was <S%H6912>buried<s%>; and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> ministered in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office in his stead.
From there they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> unto <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%>; and from <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%> to <S%H3193>Jotbath<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H914>separated<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H1288>him<s%>, and to bless in his <S%H8034>name<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Why <S%H3878>Levi<s%> has no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%>; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, according as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> promised <S%H1696>him<s%>.

And I <S%H5975>stayed<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, according to the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto me at that <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H3068>also<s%>, and the Lord <S%H14>would<s%> not destroy <S%H7843>you<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, Arise, <S%H3212>take<s%> your <S%H4550>journey<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they may go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give unto <S%H5414>them<s%>.

And <S%H3478>now<s%>, Israel, what does the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7592>require<s%> of <S%H3372>you<s%>, but to fear the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H5647>him<s%>, and to serve the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>,
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> for your <S%H2896>good<s%>?
<S%H8064>Behold<s%>, the heaven and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s your <S%H430>God<s%>, the earth <S%H776>also<s%>, with all that in it is.

Only the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had a <S%H2836>delight<s%> in your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H977>them<s%>, and he chose their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>, even you above all people, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
<S%H4135>Circumcise<s%> therefore the <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and be no more <S%H6203>stiffnecked<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, a <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, and a <S%H3372>terrible<s%>, which <S%H5375>regards<s%> not <S%H6440>persons<s%>, nor <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%>:

He does <S%H6213>execute<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow<s%>, and <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, in <S%H5414>giving<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H8071>clothes<s%>.
<S%H157>Love<s%> you therefore the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>: for you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; him shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%>, and to him shall you <S%H1692>cleave<s%>, and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

He is your <S%H8416>praise<s%>, and he is your <S%H430>God<s%>, that has <S%H6213>done<s%> for you these <S%H1419>great<s%> and terrible <S%H3372>things<s%>, which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>.

Your <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>; and now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> you as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.
